Dataset name: Ghana CO2 emissions
Dataset brief description: In 2018, CO2 emissions for Ghana was 20.1 million tonnes. CO2 emissions of Ghana increased from 6.9 million tonnes in 1999 to 20.1 million tonnes in 2018 growing at an average annual rate of 6.22%. Carbon dioxide emissions are those stemming from the burning of fossil fuels and the manufacture of cement. They include carbon dioxide produced during consumption of solid, liquid, and gas fuels and gas flaring.

En este conjunto de datos se proporciona esta informacion.
